title: Dazzling Diamond Bangles: Radiate Elegance
materials: Natural Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (SI Clarity
features: Two-row design featuring meticulously prong-set diamonds. The zig-zag pattern maximizes the diamond's brilliance. Features a secure locking mechanism for ease of wear and enhanced security.
occasions: and festive celebrations. Elevates any look from traditional attire to evening gowns.
description: Crafted with the finest 22K gold and ethically sourced diamonds, these bangles are a timeless investment. The classic design ensures versatility, while the Hyderabadi polish lends a distinctive luster. These are sure to become family heirlooms, passed down through generations. Modern twist on classic traditional South Indian Bangle.
